weather_impact.title: Weather Impact Analysis
weather_impact.subtitle: How weather conditions affect your crop yield

items.monitor_drainage: Monitor soil drainage to prevent waterlogging
items.apply_fungicide: Apply fungicide preventively for disease control
items.provide_shade: Provide shade during peak heat hours
items.increase_irrigation: Increase irrigation frequency in hot weather
items.cold_stress: Monitor for cold stress in crops
items.ensure_air_circulation: Ensure good air circulation to reduce humidity
items.implement_drip: Implement drip irrigation for water conservation
items.prepare_drainage: Prepare drainage systems for excess water

messages.high_temp_alert: Average temperature {avgTemp}°C is above optimal for {crop}. Schedule irrigation for early morning (5-7 AM) or evening (6-8 PM) to prevent heat stress.
messages.low_temp_warning: Cool temperatures ({avgTemp}°C) may slow {crop} growth. Consider row covers or greenhouse protection during cold nights.
messages.heavy_rainfall_risk: Expected {totalRain}mm rainfall over 7 days. Ensure proper field drainage and avoid fertilizer application before heavy rain to prevent nutrient runoff.
messages.drought_stress_alert: Low rainfall ({totalRain}mm) expected. Increase irrigation frequency and apply mulch to retain soil moisture for {crop}.
messages.fungal_disease_risk: High humidity ({avgHumidity}%) increases fungal disease risk for {crop}. Apply preventive fungicide and ensure good air circulation.

crop_guidance.rice: Maintain 2-5cm standing water. Monitor for blast disease in high humidity.
crop_guidance.wheat: Avoid waterlogging. Watch for rust diseases in humid conditions.
crop_guidance.maize_corn: Ensure good drainage. Monitor for corn borer in warm, humid weather.
crop_guidance.cotton: Prevent waterlogging. Watch for bollworm activity in warm weather.
crop_guidance.sugarcane: Maintain consistent moisture. Monitor for red rot in humid conditions.

messages.high_humidity: High humidity ({humidity}%) increases disease risk for {crop}.

actions.improve_ventilation: Improve ventilation and monitor for fungal diseases

irrigation.description: Optimal water management strategy for {crop} based on current soil moisture of {moisture}%

timeline.subtitle: Dynamic timeline based on weather patterns and soil conditions

considerations.high_temp: High temperatures ({avg}°C avg) - consider heat protection measures
considerations.heavy_rain: Heavy rainfall expected ({rain}mm) - ensure proper drainage
considerations.low_rain: Low rainfall ({rain}mm) - irrigation may be required

soil_reco.ph_acidic: Soil pH ({ph}) is acidic - consider lime application
soil_reco.ph_alkaline: Soil pH ({ph}) is alkaline - consider gypsum application
soil_reco.low_n: Low nitrogen levels ({n}) - increase nitrogen fertilizer

sustainability.header_subtitle: Real-time sustainability metrics based on your farm data
sustainability.awd_action: Consider alternate wetting and drying (AWD) irrigation method

nitrogen.deficient: Apply 40-50kg/hectare urea immediately. Current level ({value}%) is critically low for {crop} in {month}.
nitrogen.moderate: Apply 20-25kg/hectare urea. Current level ({value}%) needs supplementation for optimal {crop} growth.

phosphorus.low: Apply 30-40kg/hectare DAP. Current P level ({value}%) is limiting root development.

potassium.low: Apply 25-30kg/hectare MOP. Low K ({value}%) affects disease resistance and fruit quality.

ph_correction.acidic: Apply 2-3 tons/hectare agricultural lime. Current pH ({value}) is too acidic for optimal {crop} nutrient uptake.
ph_correction.alkaline: Apply 1-2 tons/hectare gypsum. High pH ({value}) may cause micronutrient deficiencies.

organic_matter.low: Add 3-4 tons/hectare compost. Low organic matter ({value}%) affects soil structure and water retention.

action.weather_adaptive: High rainfall and humidity detected. Use slow-release fertilizers to prevent nutrient leaching.

nitrogen.deficient: Apply in 2 split doses: 60% at planting, 40% at vegetative stage.
nitrogen.moderate: Apply during active growth phase for maximum uptake.

phosphorus.low: Apply at soil preparation stage for better root establishment.

potassium.low: Apply during flowering stage for better fruit/grain development.

ph_correction.acidic: Apply 2-3 weeks before planting and incorporate into soil.
ph_correction.alkaline: Apply during soil preparation and irrigate well.

organic_matter.low: Apply during land preparation and mix thoroughly.

timing.weather_adaptive: Switch to coated urea and apply micronutrient foliar spray.

nitrogen.deficient: Apply in 2 split doses: 60% at planting, 40% at vegetative stage.
nitrogen.moderate: Apply during active growth phase for maximum uptake.

phosphorus.low: Apply at soil preparation stage for better root establishment.

potassium.low: Apply during flowering stage for better fruit/grain development.

ph_correction.acidic: Apply 2-3 weeks before planting and mix well into soil.
ph_correction.alkaline: Apply during soil preparation and provide good irrigation.

organic_matter.low: Apply during land preparation and mix thoroughly.

timing_detail.weather_adaptive: Use coated urea and apply micronutrient foliar spray.

phosphorus.low: Strong root system, 10-15% better nutrient uptake

potassium.low: Enhanced disease resistance, better quality produce

organic_matter.low: Better soil structure, improved water and nutrient retention

expected.weather_adaptive: Reduced nutrient loss, sustained plant nutrition

actions.use_resistant_varieties_and_avoid_waterl: Use resistant varieties and avoid waterlogging
